content: row st count will remain the same throughout 6 row 1 attach yarn to 1st exposed flo/blo st on seam working through both flo & blo ch1 1 single_crochet in each of 6 sts exposed turn row note repeat this row until strap measures 2 5 l 2-*12 ch1 1 single_crochet in each st across turn row 13 ch1 1 single_crochet in 1st st ch4 sk4 1 single_crochet in last st row 14 ch1 1 single_crochet in 1st st 4 single_crochet in ch4 loop 1 single_crochet in last st fasten_off & weave in ends button lay strap across pillow attach button center lengthwise where button hole lines up which should be close to other edge of pillow below you will find tags that you can print cardstock works best & attach to your port pillows when you donate them chemo port seat belt pillow pattern designed by @marshayarndoodles / 2025 page 2 of 2 chemo port seat belt pillow pattern designed by @marshayarndoodles / 2025 page 3 of 2
